title: It Was a Fun Summer
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Today’s the last day of summer break~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Time really flew by. It feels like the first day of summer break was just yesterday.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Even so, we had a lot of fun together, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Fufu, yup~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Did you enjoy helping out at the shrine on the last day of summer break?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Of course! The summer festival here was super fun. Coming to eat shaved ice was great, and I enjoyed training and practicing on the stairs with you. Helping out is my way of showing my gratitude.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Even the gods would be pleased to hear that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hey, after we’re done, why don’t we go draw a fortune slip?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’ll draw one too. We can find out our fortunes for the coming school term.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, right! I hope the new school term will be full of fun too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
